results.content: The course was well designed and presented with clear explanations of each step of coding. As a windows user I found it a disadvantage not to have a text editor that was overlaid with Bootstrap 3. For anyone starting out on bootstrap this a great basic course. Highly recommended.
results.content_html: The course was well designed and presented with clear explanations of each step of coding. As a windows user I found it a disadvantage not to have a text editor that was overlaid with Bootstrap 3. For anyone starting out on bootstrap this a great basic course. Highly recommended.

results.content: Great material to start although still missing good bits like navbars and carousel. I have to set the speed to 1.25X.
results.content_html: Great material to start although still missing good bits like navbars and carousel. I have to set the speed to 1.25X.

results.content: I though we was going to learn more nav bar tips and how to create good templates
results.content_html: I though we was going to learn more nav bar tips and how to create good templates

results.content: Based on the reviews, I thought this was going to be a lot better. The videos are good and they are educational, but it didn't really teach many practical applications of the elements that you learn. It's all divided into pieces, instead of working toward building an entire site, which would've been helpful.
results.content_html: Based on the reviews, I thought this was going to be a lot better. The videos are good and they are educational, but it didn't really teach many practical applications of the elements that you learn. It's all divided into pieces, instead of working toward building an entire site, which would've been helpful.

results.content: Clear, easy to understand and well delivered! I recommend this course for beginners in web application design, no matter if they don't know another framework, this course will really make them get what all this is about.
results.content_html: Clear, easy to understand and well delivered! I recommend this course for beginners in web application design, no matter if they don't know another framework, this course will really make them get what all this is about.

results.content: What a great way to learn bootstrap building the various elements from the lectures right in the templates included in the course! I'm a web developer and needed to get up to speed quickly on bootstrap. This course was just the ticket. I dug in and learned what I needed to understand in one day! Thanks Gobala! Looking forward to your next course.
results.content_html: What a great way to learn bootstrap building the various elements from the lectures right in the templates included in the course! I'm a web developer and needed to get up to speed quickly on bootstrap. This course was just the ticket. I dug in and learned what I needed to understand in one day! Thanks Gobala! Looking forward to your next course.

results.content: Lots of great info! Fairly easy to understand and follow. Towards the end I got a little overwhelmed but got thru it. The only suggestion would be to do a whole site at the end with mix and matching the snippet codes similar to last lesson but more of a start to finish project.
results.content_html: Lots of great info! Fairly easy to understand and follow. Towards the end I got a little overwhelmed but got thru it. The only suggestion would be to do a whole site at the end with mix and matching the snippet codes similar to last lesson but more of a start to finish project.

results.content: A really nice way to quickly build a bootstrap webpage. Really nice examples and heaps of extra resources you can use to boost or reinforce your current learning level.
results.content_html: A really nice way to quickly build a bootstrap webpage. Really nice examples and heaps of extra resources you can use to boost or reinforce your current learning level.

results.content:
Using the bootstrap documentation can be intimidating even confusing when you are getting started; this course changed that for me and now I’ve a better grasp of how the framework is setup, which makes using the documentation so much more easier.

Thanks Gobala
results.content_html:
Using the bootstrap documentation can be intimidating even confusing when you are getting started; this course changed that for me and now I’ve a better grasp of how the framework is setup, which makes using the documentation so much more easier.

results.content: I just finished this course and would highly recommend it to anyone interested in learning Bootstrap 3.  Gobala Krishnan's presentation of the lessons was easy to understand and follow along.  I learned much more from this course then any other Bootstrap course I have taken so far.
